tool.name: SAGA.statistics_grid.18
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayCOUNT False isArraySUM False isArraySUM2 False isArrayMIN False isArrayMAX False isArrayHISTOGRAM False output_data_RANGE $output_data_RANGE output_data_MEAN $output_data_MEAN output_data_VAR $output_data_VAR output_data_STDDEV $output_data_STDDEV output_data_QUANTILES $output_data_QUANTILES name SAGA.statistics_grid.18 COUNT $COUNT SUM $SUM SUM2 $SUM2 MIN $MIN MAX $MAX HISTOGRAM $HISTOGRAM QUANTVALS '$QUANTVALS' prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RANGE $OutputSection_RANGE.outputType_RANGE transmissionMode_RANGE $OutputSection_RANGE.transmissionMode_RANGE outputType_MEAN $OutputSection_MEAN.outputType_MEAN transmissionMode_MEAN $OutputSection_MEAN.transmissionMode_MEAN outputType_VAR $OutputSection_VAR.outputType_VAR transmissionMode_VAR $OutputSection_VAR.transmissionMode_VAR outputType_STDDEV $OutputSection_STDDEV.outputType_STDDEV transmissionMode_STDDEV $OutputSection_STDDEV.transmissionMode_STDDEV outputType_QUANTILES $OutputSection_QUANTILES.outputType_QUANTILES transmissionMode_QUANTILES $OutputSection_QUANTILES.transmissionMode_QUANTILES

param.name: COUNT
param.label: Number of Values
param.help: Number of Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: SUM
param.label: Sum
param.help: Sum The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: SUM2
param.label: Sum of Squares
param.help: Sum of Squares The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: MIN
param.label: Minimum
param.help: Minimum The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: MAX
param.label: Maximum
param.help: Maximum The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: HISTOGRAM
param.label: Histogram
param.help: Histogram The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: QUANTVALS
param.label: Percentiles
param.help: Separate the desired percentiles by semicolon

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RANGE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_MEAN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_VAR
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_STDDEV
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_QUANTILES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Calculates statistical properties (arithmetic mean, range, variance, standard deviation, percentiles) on a cell-wise base. This tool takes input about basic statistical information as it can be collected with the 'Build/Add Statistics for Grids' tools. These three tools (build, add, evaluate) have been designed to inspect a large number of grids that could otherwise not be evaluated simultaneously due to memory restrictions.
